name: Kirk Franklin
description: '''Kirk Dewayne Franklin''' (born January 26, 1970) is an American [[Gospel music|gospel]] musician. One of the [[List of best-selling gospel music artists|best-selling gospel music artists]], his accolades include 20 [[Grammy Awards]]. ''[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]]'' dubbed Franklin as a "Reigning King of Urban Gospel", and is one of the inaugural inductees into the [[Black Music & Entertainment Walk of Fame]]. He also lead  lead the known ensembles, which had helped to define much recognition, such as The Family, [[God's Property]], and [[One Nation Crew]] (1NC).
